description: An invoice is a document that contains the list of service rendered or items purchased from a company by a person or another company. It contains details such as when the payment is due and how much is owed.

product name.instruction: The short name of the product without any extra details

product description.instruction: The full item list description text

LINE_ITEMS.instruction: Line items table listing all the items / services charged in the invoice including quantity, price, amount, product / service name and description.

ID.instruction: Unique ID associated with the invoice

DATE.instruction: Date on which invoice was issued

PO.instruction: Purchase order number listed on the invoice

SUBTOTAL.instruction: sum of amounts listed in the line items table for services

TAX.instruction: list of tax amounts charged on the invoice

TOTAL.instruction: total amount due including subtotal and tax

VENDORNAME.instruction: name of the vendor issuing the invoice

VENDORADDRESS.instruction: address of the vendor issuing the invoice

RECIPIENTNAME.instruction: name of the person / organization receiving the invoice

RECIPIENTADDRESS.instruction: address of the person / organization receiving the invoice

VALIDATION.instruction: Is subtotal field = sum of amounts listed in the predict / services table?

VENDOR_TAX_ID.instruction: The ABN / VAT / PAN number associated with the vendor

RECEIVER_TAX_ID.instruction: The ABN / VAT / PAN number associated with the receiver
